changes: Feature: Provider priority reordering (Civitai > HuggingFace > Liblib > ModelScope > Google)
Feature: Added LiblibProvider for liblib.art native search
Feature: Chinese Core Extraction for better international platform matching
Feature: Non-model file filtering in scanner (VALID_MODEL_EXTENSIONS)
Improvement: English-only tokens as primary search term for Chinese filenames
Feature: Deep Tokenization for complex filenames (e.g., 'wan22Remix' -> 'wan 22 Remix')
Feature: Progressive Search Strategy (Raw Stem -> Spaced -> Deep Token)
Feature: Added DuckDuckGo (HTML) as robust fallback provider
Fix: HuggingFace URL parsing for gated/deep repo paths
Fix: GGUF keyword preservation for accurate quantized model matching
UI: Removed redundant version number from Settings dialog
Performance: Optimized search concurrency and scoring logic
